General.Name: AXMIN Inc
General.Description: AXMIN Inc., a gold exploration company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in central and West Africa. Its primary asset is the Passendro gold project located in the Central African Republic. AXMIN Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 Alberni Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4V2

3.Name: Ms. Celine  Li
3.Title: Assistant to the Chief Exec. Officer
